page.shortlink: api sql query namespace join object parse function
page.description: Parse the SQLStatement passed (or the value previously set into the SQLStatement property).

argument.name: SQL::Query::Join
argument.description: A SQL::Query::Join object created with a DIM statement.

page.discussion: The Parse() method accepts an optional text string and parses it. If the parse is successful, the elements of the SQL statement will be available immediately as properties of the object.
